#summary Describes the method tag.

= Tag: @method =

Sets that the member is a method.

== Example of method member ==
{{{
/**
 * This is a event.
 *
 * @method someMethod
 * @param {String} arg1 Some arg.
 * @return {String} Some value.
 */
SomeClass.prototype.someMethod = function(arg1) {
  return "";
}
}}}
